IDFromEndpoint.description: The ID assigned by the ComputingEndpoint

LocalIDFromManager.description: The local ID assigned by the ComputingManager

ExitCode.description: The exit code as returned by the main executable code or script of the job

ComputingManagerExitCode.description: The exit code provided by the ComputingManager

Error.description: The error messages as provided by the software components involved in the management of the job

WaitingPosition.description: The position of the job in the queue, if the job is waiting

Owner.description: The Grid identity of the job's owner

LocalOwner.description: The local user name of the job's owner

RequestedTotalWallTime.description: The total wall clock time requested by the job

RequestedTotalCPUTime.description: The total CPU time requested by the job

RequestedSlots.description: The number of slots requested for the job

RequestedApplicationEnvironment.description: The AppName and Version of the requested ApplicationEnvironments

StdIn.description: The name of the file used for standard input

StdOut.description: The name of the file used for standard output

StdErr.description: The name of the file used for standard error

LogDir.description: The name of the directory which contains job logs

ExecutionNode.description: Hostnames associated with the ExecutionEnvironments running the job

Queue.description: The name of the ComputingManager queue that held the job before execution

UsedTotalWallTime.description: The total wall clock time consumed by the job so far (slots*seconds)

UsedTotalCpuTime.description: The total CPU time consumed by the job so far (seconds)

UsedMainMemory.description: The physical RAM currently used by the job (MB)

SubmissionTime.description: The time when the job was submitted to the ComputingEndpoint (DateTime_t)

ComputingManagerSubmissionTime.description: The time when the job was submitted to the ComputingManager (DateTime_t)

StartTime.description: The time when the ComputingManager started the job (DateTime_t)

EndTime.description: The time when the job ended in the Grid layer (DateTime_t)

ComputingManagerEndTime.description: The time when the job ended according to the ComputingManager (DateTime_t)

WorkingAreaEraseTime.description: The time when working area will be removed from storage (DateTime_t)

ProxyExpirationTime.description: The expiration time of the Grid proxy associated with the job (DateTime_t)

SubmissionHost.description: The name of the host from which the job was submitted

SubmissionClientName.description: The name of the software client used to submit the job

OtherMessages.description: Optional messages provided by either the Grid layer or the ComputingManager
